sub_topic: Probability of a certain type of cyber attack occurring on a network
message_1: A certain organization has identified that there is an 80% chance of a malware attack occurring on their network within the next 6 months. If the organization upgrades their security system, the probability of an attack decreases to 30%. What is the probability of the organization experiencing a malware attack within the next 6 months if they decide to upgrade their security system?
message_2: If the organization upgrades their security system, the probability of experiencing a malware attack within the next 6 months decreases to 30%.
